description.value:
While on four legs, a tromlin hardshell can move at full speed and gains a +2 species bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.3QdtsfnVJsHEdrt0]{Acrobatics} checks to balance, a +4 species bonus to AC against bull rush and trip maneuvers, and a +2 species bonus to saving throws against effects that knock a target prone. In quadrupedal posture, a tromlin hardshell can’t hold objects in their hands.

Enable/Disable AC bonus against bull rush and trip maneuvers in the Modifiers tab.
